title: Cup, "Rose and Mask", 1937
markings: Marks: On underside: hammer, sickle, hand-painted in blue overglaze; Lomonosov mark for 1937 stamped in blue (faint)
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Body cylindrical with slightly rounded bottom and flaring towards top; loop handle; painted with rose, leaves, and grotesque mask face in black, gilding and silvering; thin gilded and black band at top edge and black band at base

tombstone.epitaph:
Cup, "Rose and Mask", 1937.
1937. porcelain, enamel, gilding, silvering. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-66.
